The following table briefly describes the directory/folder structure for the sample code provided with Course Builder Experimental. Much of this code you will leave as is. The last column of the table notes which files you must change to produce your own application.

|| *Pathname* || *Filename* || *Description* || *Needs changing?* || 
|| || {{{app.yaml}}} || App configuration file. In setting up the sample code, you change the app name in this file. || Yes || 
|| {{{assets/}}} || || || ||

|| {{{assets/img/}}} || || Images that appear throughout your course. || || 
|| {{{assets/img/}}} || _{{{[.png files]}}}_ || Replace these files with any that you need for your material.|| Yes || 
|| {{{assets/img/}}} || {{{favicon.ico}}} || A [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Favicon favicon] is a small image representing your course that appears in the address bar of a browser or next to a bookmark for your course. || Yes ||
|| {{{assets/js/}}} || || || ||
